stories.text:
Hey HN,

just wanted to show my latest project called tone to get your feedback. It is a cross platform command line audio tagger. Currently in an early state of development it already comes with a neat set of features:

- read and write support for a decent amount of fields - supports id3, mp4, flac and most other formats - chapters, covers and even custom tag fields - install one single binary - no dependencies (M1 macOS does not work atm - maybe someone can help out here)

Source code and release download:

https://github.com/sandreas/tone

Feedback is really appreciated.

Thanks :-)
